resources.string:
"
Welcome to Broadcast, an app to remotely post information to a second device.

" "This app is currently in development. Please register as a beta tester by filling out the below information. " "Feel free to email me at ajabbot@gmail.com with any questions or comments. Thank you!"
"What device are you running this app on?"
"Any additional information you would like to include?"

"This is the alpha version of Broadcast. Thank you for testing the app.

"
"Bugs are to be expected. Please submit bug reports to ajabbot@gmail.com.

"
